category.name: Reports
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_RA_server_parameters
preference.preference_description: Configures the Teamcenter reporting and analytics (Reporting and Analytics) parameters at the site level: server host, port, and application name. Use Reporting and Analytics, powered by eQube, to view, modify, and create reports. Valid Values: Accepts multiple strings as values in the following format: Host:application-server-host-name Port:port-number Context:application-context ServletName:eQube-servlet-name ServiceDashboard:action=url of the Reporting and Analytics dashboard
